title: Learning about industrial agriculture impacts
content:
Scenario: Learning about industrial agriculture impacts
    Given industrial agriculture has severe environmental costs
    And Aisha consumes products of agricultural systems
    When the personal_agent teaches about food systems
    Then it should explain industrial agriculture's impacts
    And it should highlight alternatives like regenerative agriculture
    And it should help her support better food systems
    And agricultural literacy should inform purchasing
    And she should understand systemic environmental issues
    And food system education should enable values-aligned choices
